opinion.posture: CERTIORARI TO THE INTERMEDIATE COURT OF APPEALS (CIV. NOS. 03-1-0305; 05-1-0031)
opinion.attorneys: Mark J. Bennett, Attorney General, Dorothy Sellers, Solicitor General, and William J. Wynhoff, Deputy Attorney General, for Petitioner State of Hawaii on the application.Page 2

center.underline: ORDER REJECTING APPLICATION FOR WRIT OF CERTIORARI

opinion.opinion_byline:
By: NAKAYAMA, J., for the court.[fn1]
[fn1] Considered by: Nakayama, Acting C.J., Acoba and Duffy, JJ., Circuit Judge Wilson, in place of Moon, C.J., recused, and Circuit Judge Chan, in place of Acoba, J., recused.
opinion.opinion_text: Petitioner State of Hawaii's application for writ of certiorari filed on July 20, 2010, is hereby rejected.
